description: A creeping mobile plant, as tall as a moose.  It has a single bark-covered stalk supporting a flowery head with a paralyzing sting concealed within.  You have the distinct sense that it's watching you.
//: Extra bullet armor here is from clairsentient anticipation of bullet trajectories, not literal armor.

description: A creeping mobile plant, as tall as a moose.  It has a single bark-covered stalk supporting a flowery head with a paralyzing sting concealed within.  The air around it wavers slightly, like a summer haze.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s waves its fronds and your %2$s is engulfed in flames!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s waves its fronds and <npcname>'s %2$s is engulfed in flames!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %1$s waves its fronds and you narrowly avoid a burst of flame!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %1$s waves its fronds and <npcname> narrowly avoids a burst of flame!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s waves its fronds and your %2$s is engulfed in flames, but they do not burn you.
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s waves its fronds and <npcname>'s %2$s is engulfed in flames, but it does not burn them.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s waves its fronds and the flames gutter and die.

description: A creeping mobile plant, as tall as a moose.  It has a single bark-covered stalk supporting a flowery head with a paralyzing sting concealed within.  Occasionally it vanishes and reappears elsewhere.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s waves its fronds at at %3$s and the air around %3$s solidifies into shapes.
